description:
Jonouchi decides to battle Dinosaur Ryuzaki without his friends’ help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Shizuka on his own.  But as Ryuzaki’s relentless dinos destroys Jonouchi’s best Duel Monsters, will Honda’s card remind him that with his friends, he is never alone in battle?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Power of Friendship! Lava Battleguard and Swamp Battleguard
友情パワー! バーバリアン1号・2号
